text: Trump policies at odds with emerging understanding of COVID's long-term harm - CBS News

text: In China, AI is no longer optional for some kids. It’s part of the curriculum - NPR
fullText: While debate rages in the U.S. about the merits and risks of AI in schools, it's become a state-mandated part of the curriculum in China, as the authorities try to create a pool of AI-savvy professionals.
